EmailTemplate.description: Template used in workflow rule to remind sales executives to fill out the order form
EmailTemplate.name: Sales Order Form reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Please fill out the Sales Order Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
The Stage for your opportunity "{!Opportunity.Name}" has been set to Closed Won.
Congratulations!
Please fill out the Sales Order Form on the opportunity at your earliest convenience.
